channel.title: Need a Little Bit Of Help
channel.description:
Ok this might sound a little stupid, but what do i send people that want to play the server? The only way i know is to send them ALL the files. Which pretty much gives them owner power.
Please don't troll. I'm new to this.

item.title: Need a Little Bit Of Help
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Only “you” needs the source files. The client manages all the animations, models, and interfaces which are packed into the cahce. The source files are what the host has that lets him modify the server. The server is what contains all the code for woodcutting, trading, ect. After you change the ip you just give people that client that will now connect to your server. If your worried about people taking the client just delete all the java files so only class files are left. Which will make it more difficult to get the code.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Little Bit Of Help

item.title: Need a Little Bit Of Help
item.dc:creator: @Iamme Iamme
item.description:
@Iamme wrote:

Im sorry, go learn to make a runescape private server. Not to sound dickish, but you need to look it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Little Bit Of Help
item.dc:creator: @oKrump oKrump
item.description:
@oKrump wrote:

But dont you need the source to make it work? Or is it just me that needs it?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Little Bit Of Help
item.dc:creator: @Iamme Iamme
item.description:
@Iamme wrote:

Simply change the Client’s ip to whatever yours is. and then compile. Delete all of the .java files, and send that to them. Remember, ONLY t he client.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Little Bit Of Help
